author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two former MLAs from Puducherry, M.A.S.Subramanian and K. Natarajan, belonging to the BJP and NR Congress respectively joined the AIADMK on Thursday in the presence of party general secretary and Chief Minister Jayalalithaa.

M. Sivasankaran, Puducherry Traders Federation general secretary, S. Bala and P. Thangamani also joined.
title: Join AIADMK
